abstract: Have to tell you, my daughter and I got back from Paris about 3 weeks ago. We saw someone at the Louvre  riding around on a single wheel ....totally convinced it was you. These VLOGS are a great way to relive an amazing trip and learn more for our next one. Magnificent !! .....Keep up the great work.....<3 from NY
J 'adore ces vidéos ,ou tu présente tout les arrondissements de Paris👌👍

The 15th seems like a world away from inner Paris and BOOM you turn around & there's old Eiffel! It's taking a lot of effort to put this 20 in 20 together and we THANK YOU for that and being a part of our morning coffee!!
